fields.summary: Android: Border properties are broken for ImageView

comments.body:
{html}

WebView also suffers from the same problem.

{html}

{html}

Also see Remove Views test. Orange WebView should respect border radius.

{html}
TIMOB-2099 is for Labels, but this border issue affects any view type.
Appears to be fixed by TIMOB-9469

Verified fixed with :
Mobile sdk-2.2.0.v20120810080115
Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.1.201207271312
Device:
Galaxy S III Android version 4.0.4
